integer.name: maxActive
integer.caption: Max active
integer.description: Controls the maximum number of connections that can be borrowed from the pool at one time. When set to a negative value, there is no limit to the number of connections that may be active at one time. When maxActive is exceeded, the pool is said to be exhausted.

integer.name: maxIdle
integer.caption: Max idle
integer.description: Controls the maximum number of connections that can sit idle in the pool at any time. When set to a negative value, there is no limit to the number of connections that may be idle at one time.

enum.name: initialisationPolicy
enum.caption: Initialisation policy
enum.description: Determines how connections in a pool should be initialized. The possible values are: INITIALISE_NONE (will not load any connection into the pool on startup), INITIALISE_ONE (will load one initial connection into the pool on startup), or INITIALISE_ALL (will load all connections in the pool on startup)

enum.name: exhaustedAction
enum.caption: Exhausted action
enum.description: Specifies the behavior of the connection pool when the pool is exhausted. Possible values are: "WHEN_EXHAUSTED_FAIL", which will throw a NoSuchElementException, "WHEN_EXHAUSTED_WAIT", which will block by invoking Object.wait(long) until a new or idle object is available, or WHEN_EXHAUSTED_GROW, which will create a new connection and return it, essentially making maxActive meaningless. If a positive maxWait value is supplied, it will block for at most that many milliseconds, after which a NoSuchElementException will be thrown. If maxThreadWait is a negative value, it will block indefinitely.

integer.name: maxWait
integer.caption: Max wait
integer.description: When exhausted action is Wait (or block) this is the amount of time in milliseconds that the pool will wait before failing. Setting a negative value will block indefinitely until an idle instance becomes available.

integer.name: minEvictionMillis
integer.caption: Min eviction (ms)
integer.description: Determines the minimum amount of time a connection may sit idle in the pool before it is eligible for eviction. When non-positive, no connections will be evicted from the pool due to idle time alone.

integer.name: evictionCheckIntervalMillis
integer.caption: Eviction check interval (ms)
integer.description: Specifies the number of milliseconds between runs of the connection evictor. When non-positive, no connection evictor is executed.

label.name: connectionLabel
label.caption: Define how mule should attempt to handle a connection failure

radioBoolean.name: noReconnection
radioBoolean.caption: Do not use a Reconnection strategy

radioBoolean.name: standardReconnection
radioBoolean.caption: Standard Reconnection
radioBoolean.description: A reconnection strategy that allows the user to configure how many times a reconnection should be attempted and how long to wait between attempts.

integer.name: reconnectionAttemps
integer.caption: Reconnection Attempts
integer.description: How many reconnection attempts to make

boolean.name: reconnectForever
boolean.caption: Reconnect Forever
boolean.description: A reconnection strategy that retries an infinite number of times at the specified frequency.

classname.name: class
classname.caption: Class
classname.description: A class that implements the RetryPolicyTemplate interface.

name.name: name
name.caption: Name
name.description: Give a name to this configuration so it can be later referenced by config-ref.

string.name: repositoryId
string.caption: Repository Id
string.description: The identifier for the Repository this connector instance works with.

enum.name: endpoint
enum.caption: Endpoint
enum.description: The type of endpoint. Values allowed: SOAP or ATOM.

string.name: cxfPortProvider
string.caption: Cxf Port Provider
string.description: Specifies CXF port provider, the CMIS connector includes a default implementation.

boolean.name: useAlfrescoExtension
boolean.caption: Use Alfresco Extension
boolean.description: Specifies whether the Alfresco Object Factory implementation should be utilized.

boolean.name: useCookies
boolean.caption: Use Cookies
boolean.description: Turn on-off cookies support, allows to set a custom implementation by extending org.apache.chemistry.opencmis.client.bindings.spi.webservices.AbstractPortProvider.

globalRef.name: config-ref
globalRef.caption: Connector Configuration
globalRef.description: Specify which configuration to use for this invocation.

cloud-connector.caption: CMIS
cloud-connector.description: CMIS (Content Management Interoperability Services) is a standard for improving interoperability between ECM systems.

mode.modeLabel: Create document by id from content
Create document by path from content
Get or create folder by path

string.name: cmisObject-ref
string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.description: The object whose Acl is intended to change.

enum.name: aclPropagation
enum.caption: Acl Propagation
enum.description: Whether to propagate changes or not. can be REPOSITORYDETERMINED | OBJECTONLY | PROPAGATE.

element-controller-list.caption: Add Aces
element-controller-list.description: List of ACEs to be added or null if no ACEs should be added.

element-controller-list.caption: Remove Aces
element-controller-list.description: List of ACEs to be removed or null if no ACEs should be removed.

string.name: aspectName
string.caption: Aspect Name
string.description: The name of the aspect to be applied to the object.

string.name: cmisObject-ref
string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.description: The document from which to get the stream. Can be null if "objectId" is set.

string.name: objectId
string.caption: Object Id
string.description: Id of the document from which to get the stream. Can be null if "object" is set.

string.name: document-ref
string.caption: Document Reference
string.description: The checked out document. Can be null if "documentId" is set.

string.name: documentId
string.caption: Document Id
string.description: Id of the checked out document. Can be null if "document" is set.

string.name: changeLogToken
string.caption: Change Log Token
string.description: The change log token to start from or.

boolean.name: includeProperties
boolean.caption: Include Properties
boolean.description: Indicates if changed properties should be included in the result.

string.name: document-ref
string.caption: Document Reference
string.description: The document to check-in. Can be null if "documentId" is set.

string.name: documentId
string.caption: Document Id
string.description: Id of the document to check-in. Can be null if "document" is set.

string.name: content-ref
string.caption: Content Reference
string.description: File content (no byte array or input stream for now).

string.name: document-ref
string.caption: Document Reference
string.description: The document to be checked out. Can be null if "documentId" is set.

string.name: documentId
string.caption: Document Id
string.description: Id of the document to be checked out. Can be null if "document" is set.

string.name: content-ref
string.caption: Content Reference
string.description: File content as specified in the payload.

enum.name: versioningState
enum.caption: Versioning State
enum.description: An enumeration specifying what the versioning state of the newly-created object MUST be. If the repository does not support versioning, the repository MUST ignore the versioningState parameter. Valid values are: none: The document MUST be created as a non-versionable document. checkedout: The document MUST be created in the checked-out state. major (default): The document MUST be created as a major version. minor: The document MUST be created as a minor version. .

element-controller-map.caption: Properties
element-controller-map.description: The properties optional document properties to set.

cloud-connector.caption: Create Document By Id From Content

enum.name: versioningState
enum.caption: Versioning State
enum.description: An enumeration specifying what the versioning state of the newly-created object MUST be. If the repository does not support versioning, the repository MUST ignore the versioningState parameter. Valid values are: none: The document MUST be created as a non-versionable document. checkedout: The document MUST be created in the checked-out state. major (default): The document MUST be created as a major version. minor: The document MUST be created as a minor version. .

element-controller-map.caption: Properties
element-controller-map.description: The properties optional document properties to set.

string.name: folderPath
string.caption: Folder Path
string.description: Folder in the repository that will hold the document.

string.name: content-ref
string.caption: Content Reference
string.description: File content as specified in the payload.

enum.name: versioningState
enum.caption: Versioning State
enum.description: An enumeration specifying what the versioning state of the newly-created object MUST be. If the repository does not support versioning, the repository MUST ignore the versioningState parameter. Valid values are: none: The document MUST be created as a non-versionable document. checkedout: The document MUST be created in the checked-out state. major (default): The document MUST be created as a major version. minor: The document MUST be created as a minor version. .

boolean.name: force
boolean.caption: Force
boolean.description: If should folder structure must be created when there are missing intermediate folders.

element-controller-map.caption: Properties
element-controller-map.description: The properties optional document properties to set.

cloud-connector.caption: Create Document By Path From Content

string.name: folderPath
string.caption: Folder Path
string.description: Folder in the repository that will hold the document.

enum.name: versioningState
enum.caption: Versioning State
enum.description: An enumeration specifying what the versioning state of the newly-created object MUST be. If the repository does not support versioning, the repository MUST ignore the versioningState parameter.

boolean.name: force
boolean.caption: Force
boolean.description: If should folder structure must be created when there are missing intermediate folders.

element-controller-map.caption: Properties
element-controller-map.description: The properties optional document properties to set.

string.name: parentObjectId
string.caption: Parent Object Id
string.description: Parent folder for the folder being created (eg: repository.rootFolder).

string.name: childObjectId
string.caption: Child Object Id
string.description: The ID of the child (or target) object in the relationship.

string.name: parentObjectId
string.caption: Parent Object Id
string.description: The ID of the parent (or source) object in the relationship.

string.name: relationshipType
string.caption: Relationship Type
string.description: The name of the relationship type that should be associated with the objects.

string.name: cmisObject-ref
string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.description: The object to be deleted. Can be null if "objectId" is set.

string.name: objectId
string.caption: Object Id
string.description: The object's id. Can be null if "cmisObject" is set.

boolean.name: allVersions
boolean.caption: All Versions
boolean.description: If true, deletes all version history of the object. Defaults to "false".

string.name: folder-ref
string.caption: Folder Reference
string.description: Folder Object. Can be null if "folderId" is set.

string.name: folderId
string.caption: Folder Id
string.description: Folder Object id. Can be null if "folder" is set.

enum.name: unfile
enum.caption: Unfile
enum.description: Specifies how the repository must process file-able child- or descendant-objects.

boolean.name: allversions
boolean.caption: Allversions
boolean.description: If true, then delete all versions of the document. If false, delete only the document object specified.

boolean.name: continueOnFailure
boolean.caption: Continue On Failure
boolean.description: Specified whether to continue attempting to perform this operation even if deletion of a child- or descendant-object in the specified folder cannot be deleted or not.

enum.name: get
enum.caption: Get
enum.description: NavigationOptions that specifies whether to get the parent folder, the list of immediate children or the whole descendants tree.

string.name: folder-ref
string.caption: Folder Reference
string.description: Folder Object. Can be null if "folderId" is set.

string.name: folderId
string.caption: Folder Id
string.description: Folder Object id. Can be null if "folder" is set.

integer.name: depth
integer.caption: Depth
integer.description: If "get" value is DESCENDANTS, represents the depth of the descendants tree.

string.name: filter
string.caption: Filter
string.description: Comma-separated list of properties to filter (only for CHILDREN or DESCENDANTS navigation).

string.name: orderBy
string.caption: Order By
string.description: Comma-separated list of query names and the ascending modifier "ASC" or the descending modifier "DESC" for each query name (only for CHILDREN or DESCENDANTS navigation).

string.name: cmisObject-ref
string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.description: The object whose Acl is needed.

string.name: document-ref
string.caption: Document Reference
string.description: The document whose versions are to be retrieved.

string.name: documentId
string.caption: Document Id
string.description: Id of the document whose versions are to be retrieved.

string.name: filter
string.caption: Filter
string.description: Comma-separated list of properties to filter (only for CHILDREN or DESCENDANTS navigation).

string.name: orderBy
string.caption: Order By
string.description: Comma-separated list of query names and the ascending modifier "ASC" or the descending modifier "DESC" for each query name (only for CHILDREN or DESCENDANTS navigation).

string.name: cmisObject-ref
string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.description: The document from which to get the stream. Can be null if "objectId" is set.

string.name: objectId
string.caption: Object Id
string.description: Id of the document from which to get the stream. Can be null if "object" is set.

string.caption: Filter
string.description: Comma-separated list of properties to filter.

string.name: orderBy
string.caption: Order By
string.description: Comma-separated list of query names and the ascending modifier "ASC" or the descending modifier "DESC" for each query name.

string.name: cmisObject-ref
string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.description: The document from which to get the stream. Can be null if "objectId" is set.

string.name: objectId
string.caption: Object Id
string.description: Id of the document from which to get the stream. Can be null if "object" is set.

string.name: path
string.caption: Path
string.description: Path of the object to retrieve.

string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.description: The object whose relationships are needed.

string.name: objectId

string.description: Id of the object whose parent folders are needed. can be null if "object" is set.

string.name: cmisObject-ref
string.caption: Cmis Object Reference
string.description: The object to move. Can be null if "objectId" is set.

string.name: objectId
string.caption: Object Id
string.description: The object's id. Can be null if "cmisObject" is set.

string.description: Comma-separated list of properties to filter.

string.name: orderBy

string.description: Comma-separated list of query names and the ascending modifier "ASC" or the descending modifier "DESC" for each query name.

boolean.name: searchAllVersions

string.name: cmisObject-ref

string.name: objectId
